meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>pipe</kanji> of <kanji>reason</kanji>. Imagine someone holding this pipe. It always leads to the correct decision because it is the pipe of reason. Those who have this pipe are in a higher rank than you. They are the <vocabulary>management</vocabulary>, and by using this pipe of reason they're able to make good management decisions.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
